name: Narendra Modi
tweet: Shri Keshari Nath Tripathi Ji was respected for his service and intellect. He was well versed in Constitutional matters. He played a key role in building BJP in UP and worked hard for the state’s progress. Pained by his demise. Condolences to his family and admirers. Om Shanti.

name: ParanjoyGuhaThakurta
tweet: I presented him a book written by Ravi Nair and me titled “The Rafale Deal: Flying Lies? The role of Prime Minister Narendra Modi in India’s biggest defence scandal” - read it if you haven’t yet. Available from LeftWord Books and Amazon..2/2

name: MediaCrooks
tweet: Modi's dreams for Hindus.. Before & After elections..

name: Mohan Dasari - ಮೋಹನ್ ದಾಸರಿ
tweet: After successful inauguration of our 99th office in Bengaluru & 3rd in CV Raman Nagara, BJP MLA Raghu sent GOONDA’s 2 our Vice President Retd Civil Court Judge Venkataravanappa’s place 2 threaten them with bad consequences. He was saying It’s only Modi & S Raghu, No Mohan Dasari.
